Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near Cermak-Chinatown
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing near Cermak-Chinatown due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing near Cermak-Chinatown due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
